title: Vegetarian chilli
description: This tasty vegetarian chilli is packed with lentils, vegetables and beans. Serve with rice, guacamole and soured cream.Each serving provides 265kcal, 15g protein, 33g carbohydrate (of which 12g sugars), 5g fat (of which 1g saturates), 12g fibre and 0.4g salt.
ingredients: 1 red and 1 green pepper, stalk and seeds removed, and chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
